item.title: Pew Pew - sniper bots on Github to deliver RedLine Stealer
item.description: Today, I came across an executable called uniswap-sniperbot-setup.exe that cought my attention. I had no idea what Uniswap and what a sniper bot is. If you are as curious as me: Uniswap is a crypto, web3, NFT, whatever protocol. And a sniper bot is a program that automates ‘sniping’, or placing a last-second bid on an auction item. Running the executable in a sandbox revealed that it bundles RedLine Stealer malware.
